What I’m doing - April 2020 (?)

Work

We just completed our seed investment around at Offset Earth which is super exciting.

The next few months will be all about hiring amazing people and building out the platform.

Currently I’m working on a page to display the potential for collective climate action, along side API/integrations such as our Shopify app and Zapier tree planting zap.


General

We’re still in coronavirus lock down at the moment so Cara and I are in the boat with Betty most of the day.

I’m focusing on fitness and wellbeing at the moment with dailying Youtube workouts .


Hobbies

I’ve started learning the bass guitar which is fun. Fender are offering 3 months free of their online guitar lessions so I’m following that.

I’m playing Mana Sparks on Switch at the moment. It’s a pretty challenging progressive dungeon type game.
